channel.title: Need help again Randoms this time
channel.description: Well if u saw my last post im curently working on my first script which is power cutter i finaly finished the code but i still got error with it which i posted on villu-reborn.com not gonna post that error here for now.......but anyway i need a good random procedure like findnormal randoms but i got no idea where to put into code and what to put inbetween [scar]Procedure FindNormalRandoms; begin repeat ????????? end;[/scar] Does it matter where i put this in code or can i just put it anywhere in script then put anywhere in main loop?

item.source: Need help again Randoms this time

item.title: Need help again Randoms this time
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

All youll have to do is add [scar]FindNormalRandoms;[/scar]
But before that youll need to add this.

Hold on let me find it for you.

EDIT:
This is what procedures you will need.

[scar]
Procedure DeclarePlayers;
Begin
HowManyPlayers := 1; // Set Number of Players here.
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;
CurrentPlayer := 0; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index

Players[0].Name := '';   //Username
Players[0].Pass := ''; //Password
Players[0].Nick := '';         //3 or 4 letters username
Players[0].Loc := '';               //Leave as blank
Players[0].Skill := 'Woodcutting';  //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[0].Active := True;

Writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers) + ’ Players’);
End;
[/scar]

And then this in your main loop, somwhere around the very begining is good.

[scar]
DeclarePlayers;
NickNameBMP := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick, UpChars);
[/scar]

You will need them because first it declares your players as it says, and then the NickNameBMP will make a bitmap of your nickname. You need this because everytime you call FindNormalRandoms; it will look for the nick name of what you typed on the runescape main screen.
Anything else just ask.
~jR

Read full topic
